long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Killing tabs since 2019 - extension for Chrome

*UPDATE*: Had to change storage system from sync to local, data might be lost in new version :(

Save and burn tabs as you need them! Only have tabs open that you need, store the rest!

An extension made for those with too many tabs open. It gives them the opportunity to store some of those tabs in specific categories to be re-opened later. Once the tab gets re-opened, it is also deleted from the list in the extension. It's not meant to be a place to store favorites. It's a temperary space to drop en delete tabs by group.

Let me know if questions, feedback, bugs, features, ...
